When I lived abroad it was terrifying to text friends during terror incidents making sure they were okay in London, Paris & Barcelona. I am so insanely upset that I had to do that same thing last week for my friends in Toronto. Especially when you know ppl who live on that street

Not so long ago we had the attack on women is Montreal, and now Toronto. Canada we have a misogyny problem that we need to combat. We pretend to be so different then our brother to the south, but if we do not act we are no better.

Like the fact that we even had a terror incident fueled by misogyny at home is shocking and disturbing. At this point if you aren’t supporting feminists you’re turning a blind eye to the danger women face every day
If anyone ever asks me why I’m a feminist I may smack them. We literally had a misogynist kill 10 people less than an hour away because he thought women owed his sex
